an6.117:1.1: “Cha, bhikkhave, dhamme appahāya abhabbo kāye kāyānupassī viharituṁ.
an6.117:1.3: Kammārāmataṁ, bhassārāmataṁ, niddārāmataṁ, saṅgaṇikārāmataṁ, indriyesu aguttadvārataṁ, bhojane amattaññutaṁ.
an6.117:1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cha dhamme appahāya abhabbo kāye kāyānupassī viharituṁ.
an6.117:2.1: Cha, bhikkhave, dhamme pahāya bhabbo kāye kāyānupassī viharituṁ.
an6.117:2.3: Kammārāmataṁ, bhassārāmataṁ, niddārāmataṁ, saṅgaṇikārāmataṁ, indriyesu aguttadvārataṁ, bhojane amattaññutaṁ.
an6.117:2.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cha dhamme pahāya bhabbo kāye kāyānupassī viharitun”ti.
